title: I am not receiving verification texts from and apps. I just moved to Australia and got a boost card.
content:
I just moved to Australia and bought a Boost SIM card. After I got a new number and plan I stopped getting verification messsages from any applications. This has proven to be difficult as I need to log into my bank (ANZ) but cannot because it is trying to verify my phone number first. 

I did switch over to the Australia play store. 

I have asked the boost community but have gotten zero responses.
